abstract: International Cycling Union, cycling's governing body, announces new tour for women's racing called WorldTour; series will run from March through September and feature 17 events.
lead_paragraph: Cycling’s governing body, known as the U.C.I., announced a new tour for women’s racing, promising more events and greater visibility for what has largely been a neglected part of the sport.

headline.main: New Tour Is Announced for Women
headline.print_headline: New Tour Is Announced for Women

snippet: Cycling’s governing body, known as the U.C.I., announced a new tour for women’s racing, promising more events and greater visibility for what has largely been a neglected part of the sport.
